author: @thomafred
text: Personally I have been doing some work on a beaglebone. It should house everything you need and, depending on your requirements, shouldn't be too hard to set up.  It is however very powerful, with the beaglebone black clocking in at 1000MHz and 512MB DDR3 ram. Also, capes makes it very good for the kind of task you are looking at.
